definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The system of writing Japanese using Chinese characters.
examples: Japanese is written in a mixture of kanji and kana.

definitions.definition: Any individual Chinese character as used in the Japanese language.
examples: I know about a thousand kanji .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The system of writing Japanese using Chinese characters.
secondary_definitions: Any individual Chinese character as used in the Japanese language.

definitions.definition: A North Indian fermented drink made with beetroot , black mustard seeds, carrots etc.
Rice gruel made by fermentation of rice and tastes sour.

main_definition: A North Indian fermented drink made with beetroot , black mustard seeds, carrots etc.
secondary_definitions: Rice gruel made by fermentation of rice and tastes sour.
